data.name: Chaos Battle Universe
data.detailed_description:
Chaos Battle Universe is a strand-type game that allows you to play out your dream scenario of your favorite characters across the chaos multiverse beating each other up!



  • Select your team as you like, then watch the fight from above and control each character in real-time and let the action unfold.

  • With comedic physics you can even observe your enemies fly across the map.

  • With the gold and experience earned from each battle won, you must level up and unlock new characters

  • Play through the breathtakingly immersive story and beat all chapters to finally confront the Eternal Being that brought this Chaos Universe to life!


Key Features:


Tons of different characters to unlock and level up!


Deploy your roaster in over 50 different levels and see how well they fare against the characters of the multiverse

13 Unique Maps/Battlegrounds


Try out many different combinations of characters in the sandbox mode. Setup your own battle and choose the level you want to fight in!

data.short_description: Build teams from your favorite characters across the Multiverse and let them clash in epic confrontations throughout various stages.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 7 64 Bit
  • Processor: Intel Core i5 3470 (or comparable AMD processor)
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: nVidia GTX750 TI (or comparable Radeon Graphics Card)
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 3400 MB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
